name: koi-timer
description: The Koi Timer is the one stop shop for all your pomodoro time needs.

scripts.predeploy: pnpm run build && pnpm -r --filter ./apps/backend run copyFrontend && docker build . -t jondeates/koi-timer:$npm_package_version -t jondeates/koi-timer:latest
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && docker push jondeates/koi-timer:$npm_package_version && docker push jondeates/koi-timer:latest
